# delegate

**Instance Property**

The animation delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any NSAnimationDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The delegate must conform to the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAnimationDelegate].
title: delegate
